actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Three Shortsword or Hand Crossbow attacks. It can replace one attack with Flame Jet attack.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 9 (1d6+6) piercing damage + 13 (9d8) radiant.

bonus_actions.name: Grappling Hook (Recharge 4-6)
bonus_actions.desc: The ghost hunter launches its grappling hook at a Large or larger object or structure or at a Huge or larger creature it can see within 60' of it and is pulled to an unoccupied space within 5 ft. of the target with o provoking opportunity attacks.

bonus_actions.name: Elusive Hunter
bonus_actions.desc: Takes the Dodge or Hide action.

reactions.name: Flame Burst
reactions.desc: When a hostile creature enters a space within 5 ft. of the ghost hunter the hunter can release a burst of fire from its clockwork hand. The creature must make DC 17 Dex save or take 7 (2d6) fire and have disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes vs. the ghost hunter before the end of the ghost hunter's next turn.

special_abilities.name: Blessed Weapons
special_abilities.desc: Its weapon attacks are magical. When the hunter hits with any weapon the weapon deals an extra 3d8 radiant (included in the attack).

special_abilities.name: Ethereal Sight
special_abilities.desc: Can see 60' into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane and vice versa.

special_abilities.name: Hidden Hunter
special_abilities.desc: While the ghost hunter remains motionless it is invisible to Undead.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on attacks vs. creature if 1+ unincapacitated attacker ally is within 5 ft. of target.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: In sunlight disadvantage on attacks and Wis (Perception) checks that use sight.

special_abilities.name: Undead Hunter
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on Wis (Perception) and Wis (Survival) checks to find and track Undead.

special_abilities.name: Hand Crossbow
special_abilities.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit 30/120' one target 9 (1d6+6) piercing damage + 13 (3d8) radiant.

special_abilities.name: Flame Jet
special_abilities.desc: Melee or Ranged Spell Attack: +8 to hit 5 ft. or range 60' one target 18 (4d6+4) fire. If the target is a creature or a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried it ignites. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire the target takes 5 (1d10) fire at the start of each of its turns.

special_abilities.name: Holy Strike (Recharge 5-6)
special_abilities.desc: The ghost hunter flips up its eyepatch to reveal a holy relic embedded within the empty socket. Each creature within 30' of the ghost hunter must make a DC 17 Dex save taking 36 (8d8) radiant on a failed save or half damage if made. If an Undead fails the save it is also stunned until the end of its next turn.
